tool_description: API provides you with the ability to send a text message, video message or image at the highest speed and easy to use
name: Whatsapp API
title: Whatsapp API

api_list.name: Running Instances
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://whatsapp-api5.p.rapidapi.com/api/v2/live_instance/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "whatsapp-api5.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://whatsapp-api5.p.rapidapi.com/api/v2/live_instance/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "whatsapp-api5.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
